Name: Amulet of a Ram
Description: Faience amulet of a kneeling ram, with suspension loop above. It is not certain which deity is depicted in these funerary ram amulets. The ram was used as an image of potency, applied to several gods, notably Amun of Thebes, Heryshef of Heracleopolis and the god Khnum, worshipped at several cities in Upper Egypt.
